values.code: onCharacteristicReadRequest(device: BluetoothDevice!, requestId: Int, offset: Int, characteristic: BluetoothGattCharacteristic!)
values.desc: A remote client has requested to read a local characteristic.

values.code: onCharacteristicWriteRequest(device: BluetoothDevice!, requestId: Int, characteristic: BluetoothGattCharacteristic!, preparedWrite: Boolean, responseNeeded: Boolean, offset: Int, value: ByteArray!)
values.desc: A remote client has requested to write to a local characteristic.

values.code: onConnectionStateChange(device: BluetoothDevice!, status: Int, newState: Int)
values.desc: Callback indicating when a remote device has been connected or disconnected.

values.code: onDescriptorReadRequest(device: BluetoothDevice!, requestId: Int, offset: Int, descriptor: BluetoothGattDescriptor!)
values.desc: A remote client has requested to read a local descriptor.

values.code: onDescriptorWriteRequest(device: BluetoothDevice!, requestId: Int, descriptor: BluetoothGattDescriptor!, preparedWrite: Boolean, responseNeeded: Boolean, offset: Int, value: ByteArray!)
values.desc: A remote client has requested to write to a local descriptor.

values.code: onExecuteWrite(device: BluetoothDevice!, requestId: Int, execute: Boolean)
values.desc: Execute all pending write operations for this device.
Callback indicating the MTU for a given device connection has changed.
Callback invoked when a notification or indication has been sent to a remote device.

values.code: onPhyRead(device: BluetoothDevice!, txPhy: Int, rxPhy: Int, status: Int)
values.desc: Callback triggered as result of BluetoothGattServer#readPhy

values.code: onPhyUpdate(device: BluetoothDevice!, txPhy: Int, rxPhy: Int, status: Int)
values.desc: Callback triggered as result of BluetoothGattServer#setPreferredPhy, or as a result of remote device changing the PHY.
Indicates whether a local service has been added successfully.
